thumb.title: Close To [Original music, Vocaloid6, Haruka]
thumb.description: LyricsI like to walk on the South side It keeps me close to history I like to stroll in the footsteps It keeps me warm, I don't know why I like to think that I met you at the right time It's glorious I like to know what the truth is Innuendo All your faces All of your eye shine All of your finery Keep it close to me
